alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 30 at 9:33PM CDT until July 01 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Emory River At Oakdale TN affecting Morgan and Roane Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Emory River at Oakdale TN. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs below Riverview Road. No buildings or roads are threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Action stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 145 PM EDT.
